title: 12 Zhi Wenzi He 5 Geren
synopsis: Midsummer is coming, mosquitoes and flies are rampant. Somewhere, in the air not far from the ground, 12 mosquitoes lined up neatly, waiting for the appearance of their prey. Soon, a tall man appeared. When caught off guard, the mosquito army whizzed down and besieged the man. He was attacked from head to toe all over his body. The man thought for a while, and felt that it was too bad for a person to be bitten. He counted the number of mosquitoes and instantly came up with a good way. The man brought in a solid man again, and the mosquito army attacked again. The difference was that each person was only attacked by 6 mosquitoes. The tall man was delighted for a while, but the honest man tried to reduce the loss, so he found another victim. In the third, until the fifth man appeared, the absolute average balance was completely broken...(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1992.The film won the Science and Education Award of the Second Shanghai Film Festival.
